latest_articles.title: JD Vance Is Booed at Winter Olympics Opening Ceremony in Milan

latest_articles.title: Olympics Officials Signal Sanctions on Russia in Sports May End

latest_articles.title: Winter Olympics, spread across north Italy, open with Milanese flair
